meanings.definition: Very bold or daring in behavior or appearance.
meanings.sent1: She wore an extrabold red dress to the party.
meanings.sent2: The superhero made an extrabold decision to save the city.
meanings.sent3: His extrabold choice of hairstyle raised a few eyebrows.
meanings.sent4: The extrabold explorer ventured into uncharted territory.
meanings.sent5: The extrabold painting stood out among the others in the gallery.

meanings.definition: A font style that is thicker and darker than the standard bold font.
meanings.sent1: The heading was written in extrabold font for emphasis.
meanings.sent2: The logo used an extrabold typeface to make it more noticeable.
meanings.sent3: The extrabold text on the poster caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent4: The extrabold font on the website made the text easier to read.
meanings.sent5: The extrabold print on the packaging made the product stand out on the shelf.
